title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Socio-Functional-Constructivist-Based English Education Material Design Model Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners apply an integrated design model incorporating sociocultural context, functional purpose, and constructivist principles when designing English educational materials.
Learners develop educational materials reflecting real-world English communication scenarios required in professional settings.
Learners iteratively refine their design models through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
